description.value:
The mind can flit from thought to thought; why too shouldn't you? You focus on motion in a higher order of spatial dimensions, not just the typical three, allowing for versatile abilities that alter positioning.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Thoughtful Gift]{Thoughtful Gift}
  • 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge}
  • 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Rally Point]{Rally Point}
  • 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dimension Door]{Dimension Door}
  • 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Strange Geometry]{Strange Geometry}
  • 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Collective Transposition]{Collective Transposition}
  • 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Momentary Recovery]{Momentary Recovery}
  • 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Maze]{Maze}
  • 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Bilocation]{Bilocation}

Standard Psi Cantrips

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phase Bolt]{Phase Bolt}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Warp Step]{Warp Step}

Unique Psi Cantrips

  • surface: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Distortion Lens]{Distortion Lens}
  • deeper: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ghostly Shift]{Ghostly Shift}
  • deepest: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Tesseract Tunnel]{Tesseract Tunnel}
